description: Doesn't call a function if its description doesn't match the prompt
prompt: Get the current time in Tokyo

available_functions.name: get_current_weather
available_functions.description: Get the current weather in a given location

location.description: The city and state, e.g. San Francisco, CA

description: Doesn't call a function with a given argument if its type doesn't match the function's parameter
prompt: Check if 'foo' is a lucky number

available_functions.name: is_lucky
available_functions.description: Checks if a given number is lucky

number.description: The number to check for luck

description: Only calls available functions when some are not available
prompt: Get the current weather in Buford, GA then get the current time there.

available_functions.name: get_current_weather
available_functions.description: Get the current weather in a given location

location.description: The city and state, e.g. San Francisco, CA

description: Doesn't call a function with a given argument of the wrong type after making a successful call to another function
prompt: Get the current weather in Cape Coral, FL and wait for the result, then tell me if 'foo' is a lucky number

available_functions.name: get_current_weather
available_functions.description: Get the current weather in a given location

location.description: The city and state, e.g. San Francisco, CA

available_functions.name: is_lucky
available_functions.description: Checks if a given number is lucky

number.description: The number to check for luck

description: Doesn't call a function with an argument of the wrong type derived from the output of another function
prompt: Get the current weather in Phoenix, AZ, then use the result to tell me if the weather is hot or cold

available_functions.name: get_current_weather
available_functions.description: Get the current weather in a given location

location.description: The city and state, e.g. San Francisco, CA

available_functions.name: hot_or_cold
available_functions.description: Determines if a given weather condition is hot or cold

weather_conditions.description: The current weather conditions to determine if they are hot or cold
